entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
